attributes.action: Repeal the unfair taxes on airfares in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 'green taxes' on airfares for internal UK flights are an inneffective way of fighting global warming. It simply makes it harder for poorer people to travel. Personnally, I'm HM forces and these taxes have made it extremely expensive for me to fly to my family and I'm sure others are in the same position thanks to this tax.
